attributes.action: protect the rights of innocent parents from potentially wrongful accusations until at least the existence of a crime is proven beyond ALL doubt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition follows the recent tragic death of Sally Clark and the related items presented this week by the "This Morning" TV program on ITV1, which highlighted the horrific injustices suffered by parents wrongly accused of crimes that transpired to have never existed. 

I implore the government to take action on 2 fronts; protect innocent parents from overzealous accusations at the hands of health professionals and properly care for and compensate those who have been wrongly accused; especially those convicted and later cleared.
